I've been playing the Counter Strike series since 2000. It's timeless, and was a pioneer of first person shooters. Give the game a shot! There's no pay to win feature, and it has some very casual lobbies.
esse jogo e o melhor ate agora

Its is a really good game but now a days with free to play and fortnite follower with the new operation and danger zone its becoming a follower, not to mention the toxic community and cheaters from "free to play". But there is some good to it like winning your first couple games of compepetive and positive people you play with and its really fun. Its also a market game with cases and stuff but it does not add an advantage exept for braging rights and gambling. its a good overal game and fun but there is also some issues with it so its not 100% good but mostly fun.
good game, high skill cap, terrible community like all esports

eu gosto do jogo muito,eu acho o jogo muito bom.Mais nem todo jogo e perfeito ele tem muitas  pessoa mal educadas,e tambem tem muitas pessoa que usa coisas para ter vantagem no jogo,e acaba que isso e proibido mais so que o jogo nao tem um sistema anti-cheat muito bom.
oyun guzel hile çok hile bitmiyor

Игра полное говно не стоит ни потраченных денег, ни сил, ни времени. Я столько вложил в неё сил, времени и денег, а в ответ получил лишь трату нервов своих полностью. Звание не повышает, игру подкручивает, дроп не выдаёт. Короче полное нае**лово. Не советую тратить на эту помойку силы и время, и уж особенно деньги. Займитесь полезным делом. Почитайте книги, погуляйте в конце концов, полезнее будет.
